name: Homewood Suites Phoenix Airport South

reviews.text: Don't be alarmed by the "airport" in the title. Although this hotel is about 10 minutes from the airport and the planes can indeed be seen out the window of your room, there is NO noise from the planes. We stayed in a very spacious and sparkling clean 2 bedroom, 2 full bath suite, which included a living room and kitchenette. It was very comfortable for a family of 4 with two teenage boys. And you can't beat 3 tv's! We stayed for 7 days and appreciated the full-size refrigerator, microwave, stove, dishes, glassware, silverware and dishwasher. The pool area with a hot tub was very clean and quiet. And the free continental breakfast and free internet were much appreciated. This will definitely be our home away from home when we are out visiting our son in college!
reviews.title: Excellent choice!

reviews.text: I frequently stay at Homewood Suites for business. I've had some mediocre experiences and some very good ones. This particular one was not up to par with some of the others. The facilities and rooms are clean, and the rooms quiet...no complaints there. Mostly minor stuff. Iron was missing from room. Only one TV remote, but it did control both TVs, so just a minor annoyance in having to carry it back and forth between the room and living area. No wine or beer in the evening reception (they say they are "close" to getting their license). They have a TV in the reception area, but might as well not as their "mood music" drowns it out. As a Silver Hilton Honors member (not very high up, I know), it still miffed me that they wouldn't allow me a late checkout (8pm) even though I offered to pay half the daily rate. The hotel wasn't packed out, so it doesn't make much business sense to let a room go vacant when you could at least realize a partial payment AND satisfy a loyal customer.
reviews.title: Okay, but could use some attention.

reviews.text: I think with a little more attention to the little things, this facility could be one of the better ones, but if I was going back again in the near future I might try a different Homewood.
reviews.title: A great place to stay - highly recommended!

reviews.text: I rated this place 29 out of 30 points possible even though there was a slight, irritating snag at the beginning - they aren't listed on the hotel shuttle numbers at the airport, for one thing, and for another, when I called another Phx area Homewood Suite and they tried to connect me, we did this three times and they never answered the phone! When I got there (after taking a taxi - note: taking any taxi from the airport is a minimum charge of $16.00, no matter how short a distance you're going - the cabbie said it was legislation, see the sticker on the window...) the guy at the desk said he'd tried to answer the phone but there was nobody at the other end. Phone problems, I guess. Still, I rated them very highly because the room was very comfortable, very clean, and very nice - little well-equipped kitchen, pretty furnishings, and lovely comfy bed. They have FREE internet access in the business center (I hate lugging a laptop with me) and those good free Homewood Suites breakfasts with actually good coffee and decent eggs and other real breakfast stuff...almost anything you could want. M-Th they have a happy hour with pretty good (especially for free) food and offer wine. Staff were outstanding - everyone, the housekeeping staff, the driver of the shuttle, the people who tend the meals - everyone! Helpful, personable, accommodating. They have the little convenience store there and I went to buy deodorant because I'd forgotten mine - the woman at the desk stopped me and handed me a complimentary one instead! They have a great, if small, but very well equipped gym, and a lovely pool and spa - actually big enough for more than 4-5 people at a time and shaped so you could snuggle with your sweetie and still be somewhat private from the other snuggling couples...and they pipe in nice music. They even have a laundry room where you can do yours. Little touches like fresh fruit at the front desk instead of those under-baked kinda icky-sweet cookies they have at other hotels.
reviews.title: Five Star Experience at the Homewood Suites PHX

reviews.text: The only point off I gave them was location - and that only because it's kind of an industrial/business area, not much of any place to walk to in the evening or mornings. But convenient to the airport, especially with the shuttle. They are my first choice if/when I go to Phoenix on business.
reviews.title: Excellent Homewood Suites!

reviews.text: This is a nice hotel but its a pretty long trip from the airport. We had a 10.5 hour flight from London and couldn't get the shuttle to pick up us when we arrived (around 8.00pm) so we got a cab and arrived quite late - we were very tired but check in was fast and courteous.
reviews.title: Great new hotel - terrible shuttle service

reviews.text: Rooms and amenities were everything you would expect from a new HS - that it to say nice quality, spacious and very very clean. The hotel wesbite photos do it justice so need to post my own. Overall we had a good nights sleep.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: The trip back to the airport the next morning again highlighted the poor shuttle service - we waited over an hour for it to pick us up. The reception staff didn't seem that interested in helping us by phoning the driver to get an ETA nor were they prepared to pay for a cab (which made some other guests who were waiting and had flights to catch very cross - understandably so) When the driver did turn up he agreed to take us straight to the rental car terminal which did save us an extra transfer.
reviews.title: Great hotel for Angels spring training
What a wonderful hotel!
reviews.text: Bottom line - nothing wrong with the hotel but if you advertise yourself as an airport hotel, getting a frequent reliable shuttle service working is a MUST. Hopefully things have improved since our stay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would have given it 4 stars had it not been for the two shuttle problems
reviews.title: Brand New and Ultra Modern

aka: Homewood Suites Phoenix Airport South Hotel Phoenix
